intro: Stellaria darvasievii, commonly known as the Darvasiev's starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the Caryophyllaceae family. It is a low-growing perennial herb characterized by its small, star-shaped white or pink flowers. The plant typically has slender stems and opposite, lanceolate leaves. It is native to Central Asia and is often found in rocky or sandy soils. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
